      • canIAttack

        public boolean canIAttack(Player player)
        <<<<<<< HEAD Function that checks if a player can attack in his position. He can do that only if he's an alien or a human with an attack card (and the rules are Advanced)
        Parameters:
        player - that requests the attack
        player -
        Returns:
        if the player can attack (so he's an alien, or he has an in item card and the items must be usable) then returns true, else false =======
